testimonials.title: What Our Members Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join our community of success stories

items.text: FitLife changed my life! The trainers are amazing, the community is supportive, and the results speak for themselves. Lost 30 lbs in 4 months!
items.author: Sarah Mitchell

items.text: Best gym investment I've ever made. The Elite membership is worth every penny - personal training included makes a huge difference.
items.author: Mike Johnson

items.text: Clean facility, friendly staff, and great classes. The 24/7 access is perfect for my schedule. Highly recommend!
items.author: Lisa Chen

items.question: Can I try the gym before joining?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a free 3-day trial pass. No credit card required. Just fill out the contact form and we'll get you started.

items.question: Can I cancel my membership anytime?
items.answer: Basic and Premium memberships are month-to-month with no long-term commitment. Cancel anytime with 30 days notice. Elite requires a 3-month commitment.

items.question: What if I freeze my membership?
items.answer: You can freeze your membership for up to 3 months per year for just $10/month. Perfect for vacations or injuries.

items.question: Do you offer student or military discounts?
items.answer: Yes! Students and military members get 15% off any membership. Just bring valid ID when you sign up.

items.question: Can I upgrade my membership later?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade anytime and we'll prorate the difference. Downgrades take effect at your next billing cycle.

items.question: What's included in the fitness assessment?
items.answer: Our complimentary assessment includes body composition analysis, fitness level evaluation, and a personalized workout plan to help you reach your goals.

items.question: Are personal trainers certified?
items.answer: Yes! All our trainers are certified through NASM, ACE, or ISSA and have years of experience helping members reach their fitness goals.

items.question: What equipment do you have?
items.answer: We have a full range of cardio machines, free weights up to 150 lbs, cable machines, squat racks, benches, and specialized equipment for functional training.
